summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-Powered PDF & Text to Notes Summarizer. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI working correctly with successful notes generation, navigation, and dashboard functionality.

integration_issues.issue: AI notes generation takes 60+ seconds to complete, may cause user timeout concerns

design_issues.issue: AI-generated notes don't always include markdown formatting (##, **, -) as expected

passed_tests: Backend notes generation with all lengths (short, medium, detailed)
Backend error handling for invalid PDFs
Frontend home page loading and GSAP animations
Frontend navigation between all pages (Home, Generator, Dashboard)
Frontend text input mode in Generator
Frontend AI notes generation and display
Frontend responsive design and UI components
